original_text:
For Gaza shall be deserted,
    and Ashkelon shall become a desolation;
Ashdod's people shall be driven out at noon,
    and Ekron shall be uprooted.
korean_text: 가사는 버림을 당하며 아스글론은 폐허가 되며 아스돗은 대낮에 쫓겨나며 에그론은 뽑히리라

sentences.original_text: and Ashkelon shall become a desolation;
Ashdod's people shall be driven out at noon,
